title: The Prime Minister of the Hellenic Republic | Kyriakos Mitsotakis
snippet: A gathering that over the years has become an important bridge between Greece and the US investment community. ... 2 December 2025 · Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis visited Oxford University, where he participated in a discussion with Ngaire Woods, founding Dean of the Blavatnik School of Government and Professor of Global Economic Governance. During the event, the... 1 December 2025 · Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis participated in a conversation with Clare Woodman, Head of Morgan Stanley for Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA), Latin America and Canada, and CEO of Morgan Stanley & Co.

title: President of Greece - Wikipedia
snippet: The president of Greece, officially the president of the Hellenic Republic (Greek: Πρόεδρος της Ελληνικής Δημοκρατίας, romanized: Próedros tis Ellinikís Dimokratías), commonly referred to in Greek as the president of the Republic (Πρόεδρος της Δημοκρατίας, Próedros tis Dimokratías, ΠτΔ), is the head of state of Greece.

title: 2025 Greek presidential election - Wikipedia
snippet: A third round of voting was held on 6 February 2025, where no candidate reached the reduced required majority of 180. The fourth round was held on 12 February 2025, where Konstantinos Tasoulas was elected as President of Greece.
